TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NetTcpBinding extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences
Public Class NetTcpBinding Inherits Binding Implements IBindingRuntimePreferences
type NetTcpBinding = class inherit Binding interface IBindingRuntimePreferences

summary.span: 一种适合于跨计算机通信的安全可靠的绑定。

span.span: A secure, reliable binding suitable for cross-machine communication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 会生成运行时通信堆栈，该堆栈使用传输安全、用于消息传递的 TCP 和二进制消息编码。The generates a run-time communication stack by default, which uses transport security, TCP for message delivery, and a binary message encoding. 此绑定是适当的 Windows Communication Foundation （WCF）系统提供的选择，用于通过 Intranet 进行通信。This binding is an appropriate Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) system-provided choice for communicating over an Intranet. 的默认配置比 提供的配置要快，但它仅适用于 WCF 通信。The default configuration for the is faster than the configuration provided by the , but it is intended only for WCF communication. 安全行为可通过在构造函数中使用可选的 `securityMode` 参数进行配置。The security behavior is configurable using the optional `securityMode` parameter in the constructor. 通过使用可选的 `reliableSessionEnabled` 参数，可以配置 WS-ReliableMessaging 的用法。The use of WS-ReliableMessaging is configurable using the optional `reliableSessionEnabled` parameter. 但是在默认情况下可靠消息传递为关闭状态。But reliable messaging is off by default. 一般来说，HTTP 系统提供的绑定（如 和 ）是默认配置为打开事项，而 绑定是默认配置为关闭事项，因此，你必须选择性加入所需事项才能获取支持，例如获取对一种 WS-\* 规范的支持。More generally, the HTTP system-provided bindings such as and are configured to turn things on by default, whereas the binding turns things off by default so that you have to opt-in to get support, for example, for one of the WS-\* specifications. 这意味着在终结点之间交换消息方面，TCP 的默认配置比 HTTP 绑定的默认配置更快。This means that the default configuration for TCP is faster at exchanging messages between endpoints than that configured for the HTTP bindings by default. > [!WARNING] > 使用基于服务的主机 DNS 名称和服务正在侦听的端口号的 TCP 连接池。The uses TCP connection pooling based on the service's host DNS name and the port number the service is listening on. 当客户端调用不同端口上的不同服务，或者服务在单个进程中托管并共享某个端口时，这非常有效。This works well when a client makes calls to different services on different ports, or services are hosted in a single process and share a port. 如果单个客户端调用共享某个端口的多个服务（这些服务共享在不同进程中托管的端口，或者是托管在 IIS 上的端口），则客户端池可能会导致出现问题，即为服务 B 重复使用与服务 A 的连接，从而导致引发异常，连接中止并创建新通道。If a single client calls multiple services sharing a port that are hosted in different processes, or are WAS/IIS hosted, the client side pooling may lead to problems where a connection to Service A is reused for Service B, resulting in an exception being thrown, the connection aborted, and a new channel created. 若要避免此问题，请使用 CustomBinding 并为客户端与之通信的每个服务指定不同的 ConnectionPoolSettings。To avoid this problem, use a CustomBinding and specify a different ConnectionPoolSettings.GroupName for each service the client communicates with. ## Examples 此示例演示如何创建 ，以及如何设置安全模式和传输凭据类型。This example shows how to create a , setting the security mode and transport credential type. [!code-csharp[S_UENetTcpBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenettcpbinding/cs/source.cs#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全行为可通过在构造函数中使用可选的 `securityMode` 参数进行配置。The security behavior is configurable using the optional `securityMode` parameter in the constructor. 通过使用可选的 `reliableSessionEnabled` 参数，可以配置 WS-ReliableMessaging 的用法。The use of WS-ReliableMessaging is configurable using the optional `reliableSessionEnabled` parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，传输安全用于保护通信（也就是说，将 的值设置为 ）并禁用可靠会话（这是 `false`）。By default, transport security is used to secure communication (that is, the value of is set to ) and reliable sessions are disabled (that is is `false`). ## Examples 此示例演示如何创建 ，以及如何设置安全模式和传输凭据类型。This example shows how to create a , setting the security mode and transport credential type. summary.span: 获取或设置可挂起的最大排队连接请求数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of queued connection requests that can be pending.

value.span: 挂起的最大排队连接请求数。

span.span: The maximum number of pending queued connection requests.

value.span: 默认值为 10。

span.span: The default is 10.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是套接字级别的属性，描述要排队的“挂起接受”请求数。 is a socket-level property that describes the number of "pending accept" requests to be queued. 如果侦听积压工作 (backlog) 队列已满，则会拒绝新的套接字请求。If the listen backlog queue fills up, new socket requests will be rejected. ## Examples 此示例演示如何获取 值。This example shows how to get the value. [!code-csharp[S_UENetTcpBinding#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenettcpbinding/cs/source.cs#8)]

span.span: The value cannot be less than zero.

member this.MaxBufferPoolSize : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置缓冲池允许的最大大小（以字节为单位），该缓冲池用于存储由绑定处理的 TCP 消息。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, allowed for a buffer pool that stores TCP messages processed by the binding.

value.span: 缓冲池允许的最大大小，该缓冲池用于存储由绑定处理的 TCP 消息。

span.span: The maximum size allowed for a buffer pool that stores TCP messages processed by the binding.

value.span: 默认值为524288字节。

span.span: The default value is 524,288 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果接收的数据超过了可进行缓冲处理的数据，则超出缓冲区大小的数据将保留在基础套接字中，直到缓冲区中具有可用于存储剩余数据的空间为止。If you receive more data than you can buffer, the data that exceeds the buffer size remains on the underlying socket until your buffer has room for the rest of the data. ## Examples 此示例演示如何获取 值。This example shows how to get the value. [!code-csharp[S_UENetTcpBinding#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenettcpbinding/cs/source.cs#9)]

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, of the buffer used to store messages in memory.

value.span: 默认值为 65,536 字节。

span.span: The default value is 65,536 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果接收的数据超过了可进行缓冲处理的数据，则超出缓冲区大小的数据将保留在基础套接字中，直到缓冲区中具有可用于存储剩余数据的空间为止。If you receive more data than you can buffer, the data that exceeds the buffer size remains on the underlying socket until your buffer has room for the rest of the data. ## Examples 此示例演示如何获取 的值。This example shows how to get the value of the . span.span: On the client, the maximum number of connections to be pooled for subsequent reuse; on the server, the maximum number of connections allowed to be pending dispatch.

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此设置需要通过将 Windows Communication Foundation （WCF） TCP 端口共享服务的启动类型更改为 "手动" 或 "自动" 来启用该服务。Using this setting requires enabling the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) TCP Port Sharing Service by changing its startup type to Manual or Automatic. 有关 TCP 侦听器及其启动方式的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about the TCP Listener and how to start it, see . ## Examples 此示例演示如何获取 值。This example shows how to get the value. summary.span: 获取或设置可由配置了此绑定的终结点处理的 SOAP 消息的复杂性约束。

span.span: Gets or sets constraints on the complexity of SOAP messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding.

value.span: 为交换的 Soap 消息指定复杂性约束的 。

span.span: The that specifies the complexity constraints on soap messages exchanged.

value.span: 下面的备注部分中提供了这些约束的默认值。

span.span: The default values for these constraints are provided in the following Remarks section.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些复杂性约束可以抵御某种类型的拒绝服务 (DOS) 攻击，这些攻击试图利用消息复杂性来占用终结点处理资源。The complexity constraints protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources. 表达这些约束及其默认值的属性如下所示：The properties that express these constraints and their default values are as follows: - = 32 = 32 - = 8192 = 8192 - = 16384 = 16384 - = 4096 = 4096 - = 16384 = 16384 ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 对象。The following example shows how to get the object. [!code-csharp[S_UENetTcpBinding#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenettcpbinding/cs/source.cs#14)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用[<synchronousReceive>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/synchronousreceive-element.md)可以更改在服务或客户端应用程序中接收消息的这一运行时行为。This run-time behavior for receiving messages in either a service or client application can be changed using [<synchronousReceive>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/synchronousreceive-element.md). ## Examples 此示例演示如何获取 值。This example shows how to get the value.
